page.title: 11ARBORFIELD TODAY (PART 1)
page.content:
IN ARBORFIELD THERE IS ONE SHOP(WITH POST OFFICE),A HAIRDRESSER,AN ANGLICAN CHURCH,AND A VILLAGE HALL.THE VILLAGE HALL IS USED FOR A VARIETY OF ACTIVITIES: 1.A DOCTOR'S SURGERY. 2.FOR VOTING. 3.PARTIES. 4.MEETINGS - eg.THE WOMENS' INSTITUTE, MOTHERS' UNION,WIVES GROUP,GARDENING CLUB AND THE OVER 60s. THE WOMENS'INSTITUTE WAS FIRST SET UP IN ARBORFIELD IN 1919.THEY HELP RAISE MONEY IN VARIOUS WAYS -COFFEE MORNINGS,'BRING AND BUY' SALES,AND A CAKE STALL IN THE MARKET.
THE WIVES GROUP IS FOR ALL LADIES OF ANY AGE.THIS ORGANISATION,LIKE THE WOMENS' INSTITUTE,RAISES MONEY IN VARIOUS WAYS,MUCH OF WHICH IS GIVEN TO LOCAL CHARITIES.
